response.overview: Dream Vapours was photographed around Up State New York late 2024 and early 2025 and edited the following months. Processes including mind-wanderings and daydreaming stimulus, not unlike invisible vapour modifications. A focus is attached to the descent or shower of snow crystals. The use of both obstreperous and transcendent images brings the viewer to a dream outside of time, exaggerated by a slow rate of movement, unrelated moods focused on various names of otherworldly phenomenon. This has been coupled with sound projections culminating in a rhythmic trance music which can induce an altered state of consciousness that allows communications with spirits and induce dreamlike states. This is part iii from the series, Dreams.
response.title: Dream Vapours
